datasource.name: getContentByCategory
datasource.parameter: ${isempty(param.q) ? "" : buildFreetextQuery("data/*", param.q, "AND")} ${ stringlength(param.contenttype) != 0 ? concat("AND ", buildFreetextQuery("contenttype", replace(param.contenttype,',',' '), "OR" )) : "" }

datasource.name: getContentByCategory
datasource.parameter: ${isempty(param.q) ? "" : buildFreetextQuery("data/*", param.q, "AND")} ${ stringlength(param.contenttype) != 0 ? concat("AND ", buildFreetextQuery("contenttype", replace(param.contenttype,',',' '), "OR" )) : "" }

datasource.name: getContentByCategory
datasource.parameter: data.level DESC, data.stars DESC, data.score DESC

datasource.name: getContentByCategory

@publishfrom
@timestamp

input.name: reference-url
input.help: URL references add to the credibility of your story

block.name: Jeg ville blitt glad for kologisk

input.name: product
input.help: Navn p det kologiske produktet du skulle nsker var tilgjengelig.

input.name: product-type
input.help: Her kan du fylle inn matgruppe for produktet du nsker var tilgjengelig

input.name: score
input.help: Opinion is a percentage between -1 and 100, of which 0 is worst and 100 is best. -1 means it is a deal-breaker, f.ex used with severe allergies
